com.ooyala.android.ui

Interface LayoutController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController, OoyalaPlayerLayoutController, OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

    public interface LayoutController

        Set the fullscreen state
        Parameters:
        fullscreen - true for fullscreen, false for inline

        Get the fullscreen state
        Returns:

      • addVideoView

        void addVideoView(android.view.View videoView)
        Insert the video view into the view hierarchy. Will automatically include other views such as TV Ratings.
        Parameters:

      • removeVideoView

        void removeVideoView()
        Remove any previously added video view, and related items such as the TV Ratings view.
